text:
@WhiteHouse "She watched her son take his last breath April 3 over a cellphone screen, two days after he tested positive...Five days later, she buried 38-year-old Kenya Williams at a memorial service with only six chairs allowed — one for herself and five...family. "
https://t.co/0Gj7asa2oR
